chapter.title: Modules
chapter.para:
Shongo consists of the following applications (modules):
Controller
Controller (shongo-controller) is main backend application in Shongo. In each domain you must run exactly one Controller.
Controller uses Java to run and PostgreSQL to store data.
Connector
Connector (shongo-connector) is application to control one or several devices (e.g., Cisco MCU or Adobe Connect server). In each domain you can run several Connectors and each of them can control several devices.
Connector uses Java to run and JADE middleware to communicate with Controller.
Web Client
Web Client (shongo-client-web) is a web application which can be used by users to use Shongo.
Web Client uses Java to run and XML-RPC to communicate with Controller. Web Client can run under Apache proxy.
Command-Line Client
Command-Line Client (shongo-client-cli) is a console application which can be used by administrators to manage Controller.
Command-Line Client uses Perl to run and XML-RPC to communicate with Controller.
